name: Sunsettting Summertime
description:
Description

High schoolers having fun. In a hot pot boil of heat. It's beach time. Read upon the life of Maxwell as he has some summer fun for a day.

Created in Ren'py. Created for the UTS Playmakers Summertime Game Jam (December 2022). Made in 2 days.

Includes LGBTQ+ themes. :)

Known Issues
  • Couldn't get persistent variable to work so story doesn't change nor background. Will fix in the future. :(
  • Endings may have errors. You can safely press Ignore if it comes up with a Keycode error.
  • Characters could overlap in certain parts of the story
Credits
  • Programmer by DoMess
  • Art by Krystal
  • Music by DoMess
  • Story by Krystal and DoMess
